title: New: MONEY – The Amazing Sessions
content:
I’ve said it before, and I’ll say it again, because quite frankly, it bears repeating: MONEY are the UK’s most exciting new band.

With a couple of single releases under their belts, and a fanbase increasing by the day, it’s surely only a question of time before they’re performing to several hundred people a night. With their majestic, all encompassing sound and Jamie’s powerful lyricism, they’re a band to become enthralled by and obsessed with, perfectly portrayed by this stellar session for Amazing Radio.

Five tracks, including two previously unheard numbers in the form of Black and Hold Me Forever, alongside recent 7″ releases Letter To Yesterday / SOLONG (GODISDEAD) and Goodnight London, it’s one of those few live sessions that’s truly deserving of a full release. “Every boy I’ve ever loved, and every girl I’ve ever loved, will close their eyes, and sing goodnight London”
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
